T

test() - Element in annotation interface jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.Check
The unique associated Test method for this @Check annotated check method.
test() - Element in annotation interface jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.Run
The associated @Test methods (one or more) for for this @Run annotated run method.
Test - Annotation Interface in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Annotate all methods in your test class which the framework should test with @Test.
testClass - Variable in class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.AbstractInfo
 
TestFormatException - Exception in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Exception that is thrown if a JTreg test violates the supported format by the test framework.
TestFramework - Class in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
This class represents the main entry point to the test framework whose main purpose is to perform regex-based checks on the C2 IR shape emitted by the VM flags -XX:+PrintIdeal and -XX:+PrintOptoAssembly.
TestFramework() - Constructor for class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.TestFramework
Creates an instance acting as a builder to test the class from which this constructor was invoked from.
TestFramework(Class<?>) - Constructor for class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.TestFramework
Creates an instance acting as a builder to test testClass.
TestFrameworkException - Exception in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Exception that is thrown if there is an internal error in the framework.
TestFrameworkExecution - Class in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
This class' main method is called from TestFramework and represents the so-called "test VM".
TestInfo - Class in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Test info class which provides some useful utility methods and information about a checked test.
TestRunException - Exception in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Exception that is thrown if the JTreg test throws an exception during the execution of individual tests of the test class.
TestVMException - Exception in jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework
Exception that is thrown if the test VM has thrown any kind of exception (except for TestFormatException).
toggleBoolean() - Method in class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.AbstractInfo
Returns a different boolean each time this method is invoked (switching between false and true).
TRAP - Static variable in class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.IRNode
 
TRUE - Enum constant in enum class jdk.test.lib.hotspot.ir_framework.Argument
Provides the boolean value true.
